snippet: The daughter of Spanish exiles received France’s most prestigious literary award for ‘Pas Pleurer,’ a novel set in the first summer of the Spanish Civil War.
abstract: The daughter of Spanish exiles received France’s most prestigious literary award for ‘Pas Pleurer,’ a novel set in the first summer of the Spanish Civil War.

headline.main: Lydie Salvayre Is Awarded Goncourt Prize
headline.print_headline: French Literary Prize Is Awarded to Novelist
